title: Communication competency enhancement program for ICT-integrated instructional design and student support

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in using digital tools
context.additional_context: Customized programs supporting professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to effectively utilize ICT in language education.

learning_goals: Learners can apply communication competency (COMP) assessments to ICT-integrated instructional design
Learners can analyze influencing factors of ICT-integrated education based on structural equation modeling
Learners can autonomously design educational materials supporting small learner groups using ICT tools
Learners can measure the effectiveness of ICT-based instructional design according to summative evaluation criteria
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
